spiritsExplanation: The workout "Samba Row" exhibits several distinct spirits. The high intensity (3 out of 3) and focus on 'drive' and 'intervals' indicate a High-Energy & Intense spirit (score: 0.8), pushing participants to their limits. The term 'max rhythm: 32' coupled with the musical influences hints at the Flow & Rhythm spirit (score: 0.7), as participants are likely to engage with the music-driven pace of Latin and global hits. The mention of being on the 'shores of Rio de Janeiro' introduces an Outdoor & Adventure element (score: 0.5) although its impact is lesser, as the main activity seems to take place potentially indoors despite the outdoor scenic description. Other spirits like Soothing & Restorative are excluded due to the emphasis on intensity and advanced fitness levels, and Structured & Disciplined doesn’t align as much due to the playful tone and rhythm focus.
